Text: The company had said Friday it was seeking 200 million pounds ($250 million) to avoid going bust and was in weekend talks with shareholders and creditors to stave off failure.
Cause: avoid going bust and was in weekend talks with shareholders and creditors to stave off failure.
Effect: The company had said Friday it was seeking 200 million pounds ($250 million)
